snippet: The P.G.A. Grand Slam of Golf, which brings together the winners of the season’s four major tournaments, has been scrapped this year because of venue complications.
abstract: PGA Grand Slam of Golf is cancelled due to agreement with presidential candidate Donald Trump not to hold tournament at his National course in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: The P.G.A. Grand Slam of Golf, which brings together the winners of the season’s four major tournaments, has been scrapped this year because of venue complications.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Golf; Major Winners’ Event Canceled
